scripts.docker:dev:debug: docker-compose --profile dev run --rm dns-proxy-dev sh -c 'node scripts/setup-config.js setup && tsx --inspect-brk src/main.ts'
scripts.docker:clean: docker-compose --profile dev --profile prod down -v && docker rmi dns-proxy-nodejs-dns-proxy-dev dns-proxy-nodejs-dns-proxy-prod 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.dev: node scripts/load-env-and-run.js .run-dev.env 'node scripts/setup-config.js setup && tsx --inspect src/main.ts'
scripts.build: node scripts/clean-dist.js && node scripts/build-dependencies.js && node scripts/build-app.js && node scripts/setup-config.js build
scripts.start: node scripts/setup-config.js setup && cd dist && node app.js
scripts.prod:tsx: node scripts/load-env-and-run.js .run-prod.env 'node scripts/setup-config.js setup && tsx src/main.ts'
